Table of Contents

Namespace osu.Framework.Graphics.Rendering

Classes

DepthValue

The depth value used to draw 2D objects to the screen. Starts at -1f and increments to 1f for each Drawable which draws a opaque interior through DrawOpaqueInterior(IRenderer).

Renderer

Represents a base IRenderer implementation for working renderers.

RendererExtensions
ShaderStorageBufferObjectStack<TData>

A wrapper around IShaderStorageBufferObject<TData> providing push/pop semantics for writing an arbitrary amount of data to an unbounded set of shader storage buffer objects.

Structs

ClearInfo

Information for how the current frame buffer should be cleared.

DepthInfo

Information for how depth should be handled.

MaskingInfo
StencilInfo

IRenderer

Draws to the screen.

IShaderPart
IShaderStorageBufferObject<TData>

A buffer which stores an array of data for use in a shader.

A buffer which stores data for a uniform block.
